#Budget2021 | Healthcare spending saw a 137% increase in India's budget estimate 2021-22; a move welcomed by healthcare experts.

As #COVID19 sharply refocuses policy on public healthcare, learn more about #vaccine research from Gagandeep Kang @GKangInd.👉 https://t.co/RfLFrLHDAF https://t.co/WK65khwbjx
